thread.title: LSU Police uses bait computers to catch laptop thief
thread.title_full: LSU Police uses bait computers to catch laptop thief - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: LSU Police uses bait computers to catch laptop thief
text:
BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) - LSU Police say they used bait computers to catch a Baton Rouge man who has been stealing laptops from people using the Middleton Library.
The Advocate reports ( http://bit.ly/1FRTx2h ) police set out three Apple MacBooks around the third floor of the Library last week where five laptops had been reported stolen in the last two weeks.
Police say 24-year-old Michael Sean Bennett was arrested Wednesday after he allegedly put one on the computers into his waistband under his jeans and quickly tried to leave.
Bennett was booked with six counts of felony theft and one count of theft, theft of goods, drug paraphernalia and possession of stolen things. His bond is set at $10,000.
Online jail records do not list an attorney for Bennett.
Information from: The Advocate, http://theadvocate.com
